verses.content: Chuong hnunga chun vânah mipui nasatakhai rawl inring- tak ni âwmtak hin, “Halleluia, san- damna dâm, ropuina dâm, thil- thawtheina dâm, ei Pathien ta a nih.

A rorêlnahai chu ân dikin a fel a nih. Ama chun nawchizawr ropuitak, a mi dit chîng leia hnuoi suk- khawhlotu chu, a ro a rêl a, a suokhai thisen insuo phuba chu a kutin a lâk ta hi, an ti ka hriet a.”
Chun, “Halleluia! A khu chu chatuonin a tungin fêng a tih,” an ti nâwk a.
Chun, upa sâwmhni le pali le thilhring palihai chu an bawkkhup a, “Amen, Halleluia,” tiin Pathien lalṭhungphaa ṭhung chu chibai an bûk a.
Chun, lalṭhungphaa inthawkin rawl a hung suok a, “Nangni a suok po po, ân zâtu mi lien le mi chînhai, ei Pathien chu inpâk ro,” a ta.
Chun, mipui nasatak rawl ang le, tui tamtak ri ang le, vâninrûm nasatak ri angin, “Halleluia, Lalpa ei Pathien Iengkimthawthei chun ro a rêl ta hi.
Hlimtakin lâwm inla, ama chawimawi ei tiu, Berâmte nuhmei nei chu a hun ta sih a; a mo khawm ânzo tah,” a ti ka hriet.
Puon zai inhmi faitak, vârtak sil phal pêk a nih a, (puon zai inhmi chu mi inthienghai thilthaw fel a ni sih a.)
Chun, “ ‘Berâmte nuhmei neina ruoiṭhea fielhai chu an hamṭha ie,’ tiin ziek rawh,” a mi tih a. Chun, ka kuomah, “Hieng thu hi Pathien thu tak a nih,” a ti bawk a.

Chuongchun, Pathien chibai bûka bûk dingin a ke bulah ka bawkkhup a. Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hienghin thaw naw raw khai, kei chu nangma le i unau, Isu inhriettirna thu pawmhai suok chan- pui ka ni annâwm; Pathien chibai bûk lem rawh; Isu inhriettirna thu chu thu hrilna thlarau a ni sih a,” a ta.
Chun, vân inhawng ka hmuh a; chun, ngai ta, sakawr vâr le a chunga chuong Ringum le Indiktak, an iti chu ka hmu bawk a; ama chun feltakin ro a rêl a, mi a do hlak.
A mithai chu meichawk ang a na, lallukhum tamtak a khum a, achun, hming ziek ama chau naw chun tûkhawmin an ihriet naw a nei a.
Puon thisen kai a sil a, a hminga chun, “Pathien Thu,” an ta.
Vâna sipaihai chun, puon zai inhmi vârtak, faitak silin, sakawr vârhai chunga chuongin an zui a.

Chun, a baua inthawkin kâwl- hnâm ngeitak a suok a, chu chu hnam tin a sâtna ding a nih; chun, thîr hmawlin an ro rêl a ta; Pathien Iengkimthawthei lunginsen nasatna grêp sâwrna khura chun sir sâwr a tih.
Chun, a puona le a êlpuia chun, “Lalhai Lal le hotuhai Hotu,” tia hming ziek a um.
Chun, nisaa khin vântirko ngîr ka hmuh a; ama chun vânlaizâwla vate vuong po pohai kuoma chun rawl inringtaka khêkin, “Pathien ruoi ropuitak ṭhenaa chun hung inkhâwm ro,
lal sa dâm, sipai hotu sa dâm, mi hrât sa dâm, sakawr sa le a chunga chuong sa dâm, mi po po– suok le suok naw, a lien a chîn khawm-an sa in fâk theina dingin,” a tih a.
Chun, Sahrâng dâm, hnuoia lalhai dâm, an sipaihai dâm, sakawr chunga chuong kha do ding le a sipaihai chu do dinga an inkhâwm ka hmuh a.

Chun, Sahrâng chu an man a, zâwlnei tehlêm-Sahrâng inchikna nei le a lim chibai bûktuhai a hlêmna hlak thilmak a mithmua thawtu kha-an man sah a. An pahni chun kâta kâng mei dîla chun a hringin an pei a.
Mi danghai chu sakawr chunga chuong kâwlhnâm, a baua inthawka suok khan sâthlum an ni tah a; vate po po chu an sahai fain an khawp ta vawng a.
